title: Ep: 028 - Filmmaker & Photographer - Gabe Reuben
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with Gabe Reuben, Photographer, Filmmaker and Co-Founder of ROVE Lab.   We discuss how Gabe got his start as a filmmaker and the experience he had working for VICE.  We also talk about is passion for being out in the ocean and how that informs his fine art photography.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
